sense.gloss: to harm, to hurt, to injure, to wreck
to miss one's chance to (do something), to fail to (do what one ought to have done)

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓に↑健康↑↓けんこう↓を|↑損↑↓そこ↓ねる|リスクがあるのは↑事実↑↓じじつ↓だ。
sdata.e: It is a fact that smoking is a danger to health.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓がないと、お↑昼↑↓ひる↓↑食↑↓た↓べ|↑損↑↓そこ↓ねる|よ。
sdata.e: Hurry up, or you'll miss lunch.
